entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
